channel.title: dinpixels' blog
channel.description: My little space for arts, thoughts, and other silly stuff

item.title: April 08, 2025 - In Lieu of Ghiblification
item.description: We scream, we bleed, we create something along with that pain.

item.title: February 25, 2025 - One's Truth, Once Lie
item.description: We can only form our own truth based from the experiences we had and views we made along the way.

item.title: February 01, 2025 - The Absurd that is Human
item.description: I think what brings the worst of us is that we constantly walk towards the brief pleasure of being alive, and so death is a gentle, eternal reminder for us to do better.

item.title: October 20, 2024 - Kunai Kitten: v0.1.8.2 - First and Jam Release
item.description: An in-depth, a bit long devlog about my thoughts and process behind the game's design. This devlog also contains screenshots and some code to visualize how some things work.

item.title: October 20, 2024 - Hello Today; Goodbye Yesterday
item.description: I deleted unnecessary programs and media, cleaned my PC, and installed Linux Mint. It was a refreshing start for me.
